    • Uses of EventHubClientException in com.ge.predix.eventhub

      Subclasses of EventHubClientException in com.ge.predix.eventhub 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EventHubClientException.AddMessageException
      EventHubClientException for when the user adds more message than stated in the event hub configuration
      static class  EventHubClientException.AuthenticationException
      EventHubClientException for when thrown when the user input (id, secret or scopes) is not correct
      static class  EventHubClientException.AuthTokenRequestException
      EventHubClientException for when when the OAuth instance does not response as expected (bad json, no response, etc)
      static class  EventHubClientException.IncorrectConfiguration
      EventHubClientException for when an action is preformed that the configuration did not support
      static class  EventHubClientException.InvalidConfigurationException
      EventHubClientException called when the the configuration has invalid entries
      static class  EventHubClientException.PublishFailureException
      EventHubClientException for when publish fails for whatever reason
      static class  EventHubClientException.ReconnectFailedException
      EventHubClientException called when the client fails to reconnect
      static class  EventHubClientException.SubscribeCallbackException
      EventHubClientException for when an incorrect callback was supplied to the client
      static class  EventHubClientException.SubscribeFailureException
      EventHubClientException for when subscriber gets an error
      static class  EventHubClientException.SyncPublisherFlushException
      EventHubClientException for propagating errors to the user during a flush() contains a list of throwables that contains th exceptions that have been thrown in the background
      static class  EventHubClientException.SyncPublisherTimeoutException 

    • Uses of EventHubClientException in com.ge.predix.eventhub.client

      Methods in com.ge.predix.eventhub.client that throw EventHubClientException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Client Client.addMessage(Message message)
      Adds a single message into queue to be sent
      Client Client.addMessage(String id, String body, Map<String,String> tags)
      Adds a message into queue to be sent
      Client Client.addMessages(Messages messages)
      Adds all messages in a Messages object into queue to be sent
      List<Ack> Client.flush()
      Sends all the messages which have been already added For Sync this function will be blocking until all the message acks have returned or a timeout has been reached
      void Client.forceRenewToken()
      Renews the token from the configured Oauth2 service
      Client.PublishCallback Client.getPublishCallback()
      Retrieve publish callback to receive acks and errors while publishing in ASYNC mode
      com.ge.predix.eventhub.client.Client.Callback Client.getSubscribeCallback()
      Retrieve subscribe callback if it exists
      void Client.reconnect()
      User reconnect function, will rebuild the channel and re-register the callbacks if there were any.
      void Client.registerPublishCallback(Client.PublishCallback callback)
      Add callback to receive acks and errors while publishing in ASYNC mode
      void Client.sendAck(Message message)
      Acknowledge a received message for a subscriber.
      void Client.sendAcks(List<Message> messages)
      Acknowledge received messages for a subscriber.
      void Client.setAuthToken(String token)
      Override current token with provided token.
      void Client.subscribe(com.ge.predix.eventhub.client.Client.Callback callback)
      Assign callback to start receiving messages from Event Hub The client when then build the required stream depending on the configuration supplied on creation
      void Client.unsubscribe()
      Stop receiving messages to the callback
